address.description: Specifies the customer's address. This address will appear on all sales documents for the customer.

blocked.description: Specifies which transactions with the customer cannot be posted. It can be ' ', 'Ship', 'Invoice' or 'All'.

currencyCode.description: The default currency code for the customer.

currencyId.description: Specifies which currency the customer uses.

displayName.description: Specifies the customer's name. This name will appear on all sales documents for the customer.

id.description: The unique ID of the customer. Non-editable.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last datetime the customer was modified. Read-Only.

number.description: Specifies the number of the customer.

paymentMethodId.description: Specifies which payment method the customer uses.

paymentTermsId.description: Specifies which payment term the customer uses.

shipmentMethodId.description: Specifies which shipment method the customer uses.

taxAreaDisplayName.description: Specified the display name of the tax area the customer belongs to.

taxAreaId.description: Specifies which tax area the customer belongs to.

taxLiable.description: Specifies if the customer or vendor is liable for sales tax. Set to true if the customer is tax liable.

taxRegistrationNumber.description: Specified the tax registration number of the customer.

type.description: Specifies the type of customer, can be 'Company' or 'Person'.

website.description: Specifies the customer's home page address.
